issue.title: [Rust] Support writing dictionaries to IPC file and stream
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10268](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10268). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently do not support writing dictionary arrays to the IPC file and stream format.

When this is supported, we can test the integration with other implementations.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10268?focusedCommentId=17239281) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8773
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8773>
